articles.author: Asit Manohar
articles.title: Buy or sell: Tech Mahindra to Asian Paints — Vaishali Parekh recommends three stocks to buy today — April 5 | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Buy or sell stocks: Vaishali Parekh has recommended three stocks to buy today — Asian Paints, UPL, and Tech Mahindra
articles.content: Buy or sell stocks: After showing a range-bound action in the last three sessions, the Indian stock market showed high volatility of up and down swings near new all-time highs on Thursday. The Nifty … [+2910 chars]
